l10n.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

params.question: The data entered into the ScoreCard software is individualized student-level data. So for each performance measure, you enter many data points.

params.taskDescription: Drag the words into the correct boxes
params.resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?

params.textField: For most performance measures, the *higher* the number, the better. Except for *absences*, for this it is better for the number to be a *lower* one.

params.textField: The target for rigorous course of study is *60%*.  The target for seniors making benchmark on the ACT is *70%*.  The target for FAFSA completion is *90%*.
